long_prompt: A small, delicate beige sunflower, its soft petals and curving stem gently swaying in the gentle breeze, grows beside a patch of wild grass under a sun-dappled meadow.
A large, creamy beige sunflower with delicate yellow petals stands tall in a well-tended garden bed, surrounded by soft morning light and a gentle breeze rustling the leaves of nearby cornstalks.
A single, beige-hued sunflower stands tall and proud in a field of golden wheat, its slender stalk topped with a round, textured bloom that seems to hold the warmth of the sun within its petals.
negative_long_prompt: A small, elegant yellow sunflower, its vibrant petals and sturdy stem gently swaying in the gentle breeze, grows beside a patch of wild grass under a sun-dappled meadow.
A small, pure white sunflower with delicate yellow petals stands in a well-tended garden bed, surrounded by soft morning light and a gentle breeze rustling the leaves of nearby cornstalks.
A vibrant yellow sunflower stretches toward the sky, its broad, round bloom a beacon of sunshine in a field of golden wheat, with its petals gently swaying in the warm breeze.
